title: Multi-view Fuzzy Representation Learning with Rules based Model. (arXiv:2309.11473v1 [cs.AI])
abstract: Unsupervised multi-view representation learning has been extensively studied for mining multi-view data. However, some critical challenges remain. On the one hand, the existing methods cannot explore multi-view data comprehensively since they usually learn a common representation between views, given that multi-view data contains both the common information between views and the specific information within each view. On the other hand, to mine the nonlinear relationship between data, kernel or neural network methods are commonly used for multi-view representation learning.
